posts.postText:
Offender name?: lolmaster
Which Server?: TTT
Offender's Steam ID?: STEAM_0:1:39245126 2
What the Offender did?: RDM Beginning of round
Admins on?: No
Proof?: http://i53.tinypic.com/2j68fw0.jpg
He rdmed again Ask Player He is my witness

In addition to your evidence Bob, here's mine.

I knife a person in front of him, then start to shoot him. Me and him are directly facing each other, so he has ample time to read my name and identify me. I then run around the corner not to be killed. As he comes along the corner he went in the opposite direction as I, and immediately killed 02 who was also a traitor but not involved in the situation at all, as it wasn't a case where he didn't shoot me or anything. When I asked him about it he said it was a split second decision and "kill or be killed". 

Now I can understand that in some situations, but I was very noticeable in front of him especially with my Spotlight headwear, and 02 having a Turtle hat, even more distinct features aside from having DIFFERENT NAMES.

Now of course I can see where he went wrong but he really shouldn't have jumped the gun rather than paying attention to clear details. So I asked him to slay himself, which he did, but in pre-round to be a smart ass. Then once the round had actually started he did not slay himself.

Here is my proof:
 http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t245/kennyd3333/lol3.jpg 
 http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t245/kennyd3333/lol2.jpg 
 http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t245/kennyd3333/lol1.jpg 
 http://i162.photobucket.com/albums/t245/kennyd3333/lol4.jpg 

^That last one is the next round proving he did not slay himself.
